content.c_answer2: The running time for Hamilton is 2 hours 45 minutes (incl. interval). For a 7:30PM performance, the show will finish at approximately 10.15PM. For matinee performances at 2:00PM the show will finish at roughly 4.45PM.
content.name: How long is Hamilton and when does it finish?
content.question: How long is Hamilton and when does it finish?
